message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the value decreases faster for you, so this offer gives you a good deal considering the future rounds.
Considering the 5% decrease in value for me, I think this is a reasonable offer. I'm willing to take a bit more than half to compensate for the loss in value.
Bob, the value is decreasing for both of us. This offer is a compromise, acknowledging the time pressure but still offering a fair split.
Considering the 14.26% decrease in value for me, I believe this offer is reasonable. I'm taking a larger share to compensate for the loss in value, but still leaving a significant amount for Alice.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  I'm offering a perfectly even split to end this now before inflation eats away at your share any further.
